text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
—— And this next thing is "Horsegirl Head-to-Head"… 
Huh, they put on some interesting performances 
at the old Festival of Illustrious Equines.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
(I thought taking a look at the festival's history might give me 
some perspective on what the Festival of Illustrious Equines 
really means to me, but…)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Hmmm……

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Mm. I don't mean to interrupt your reading, Gold City, but may I suggest something?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
If I were to share a personal recommendation, the excerpt 
from a letter on page 53 is quite noteworthy.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Page 53…?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
"After winning the Satsuki Sho, I was hailed as the 
'Sky-Sprinting Horsegirl', but at the Derby the immense 
pressure got to me, and I couldn't give my all…"

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
"Even at the Kikka Sho, I struggled on the rough track 
and couldn't win. Even so, the fans chose me to compete 
in the Arima race."

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
"Under the lantern's glow at the Festival of Illustrious Equines 
I swore to myself, 'I cannot lose. I must win, no matter what.'"

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
"Looking back, it feels like that was a necessary ritual, 
a commitment to race with everything I had."

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: A ritual……

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Late autumn… it is that time when the spirits 
of racing horsegirls shine their brightest that 
the Festival of Illustrious Equines is held.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
"Taking this opportunity", "From this moment", 
"More than ever before" — For those seeking 
the spotlight, it marks a significant turning point.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
(Curren's fully committed to her mascot role 
and Yukino greatly cherishes the festival itself.)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: (But what about me? What's my reason for dancing?)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: (If I don't want to remain a doll I need to hold my own strings.)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
I… I want to make my mark too. To prove my determination 
as a racing horsegirl in this ritual…!

text_block_list.name: Votive Dance Instructor
text_block_list.text:
—— Stop! 
Excellent, just excellent…!!

text_block_list.name: Votive Dance Instructor
text_block_list.text:
Ms. City, you've really come a long way! 
Not only is your performance put together beautifully, 
it has an undeniably alluring depth to it now!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Thank you. Actually… I want to apologize 
for my lackluster efforts so far.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
But I've decided to fully commit to it. 
Please continue to guide me!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Wow… Gold City really awakened to her potential! 
I need to step up my game as well～

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Hey, Yukino? Are you alright? 
Did you forget how to blink and breathe?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Huh!? Ah, y-yeah! 
I'm fine……

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Sorry… Ms. City's performance was just so mesmerizing ——

And so, as everyone dedicated themselves to 
practicing their dance and archery skills, the days 
of the preparation camp passed by ——

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Alrighty… everything's in order. We's be heading back 
tomorrow, so I gots ta keep things tidy.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
…… The camp's almost over. Then it's back 
ta school and straight into the main event……

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: (Am I… really be doin' enough……?)

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Yukino, Yukinoooo～! It's urgent! 
We need to gather at the community center right now!!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Wha!?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Oh wow, the costumes! They've already arrived!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Yeah♪ The URA made these new ones 
for us dancers and the archer group!!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
They're all sooooo～ cute! 
Come on, let's go and try them on～♪

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: P-Please slow down～! Ms. Curren!!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: (Aah, costumes…! Ms. Curren will definitely look good in hers… and Ms. City, she'll look absolutely stunning……!)

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: (I'm sure they will ——)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
—— Fit's perfect, nothing's in my way. I think this length 
is just about right too. Oh, about the shoes… ——

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: (Ms. City… she's so… beautiful.)

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: (So beautiful… she's breathtaking ——)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Oh, Yukino! Your costume's here too.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
They want to check the designs on us, so why don't you try 
yours on and we can see how we look together?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Ah…… oh, uhm…

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: …… I'm sorry!!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Hey? Yukino, wait ——

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Whoa! What's up, Yukino? 
Your costume's in City's room ——

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Ms. Curren… p-please, I need your help!!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Can you take over the dance solo? Please…!!
